updates.title: Majsoul emotes (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description: New package with all, upscaled majsoul emotes.

updates.title: Waifu 2x (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description: A mod that uses larger waifu2x versions of every characters emotes instead of the shitty 120x120 emotes that's normally used in game. Updated for the new Christmas/New years event

updates.title: /mjg/ Christmas pack 2023 (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description:
Christmas mod containing character sprites and emote edits from the thread.
Version with waifu2x emotes here

updates.title: Majsoul character sprites (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description: Contains all majsoul character sprites.

updates.title: Majsoul character voices (Update 2023-12-20)
updates.description: Complete package with all character voice lines.

updates.title: Umineko Sound effects + Music (Update 2023-11-21)
updates.description: Replaces regular sound effects and music in majsoul to Umineko sound effects and music! (Hopefully) fixed the music tracks. Updated for the new menu, match and riichi music. I couldn't test everything so bitch in the thread if something's broken and I'll look out for it

updates.title: Change buttons (Update 2023-11-15)
updates.description: Replaces 'Riichi', 'Ron' and 'Tsumo' prompts with 'Free Sex', 'Rekt' and 'Skill' respectively. Buttons are in 2 separate files still, but they're swapping the buttons between the files now. Fucking fantastic.

updates.title: Replace Hannah with Mokou mod
updates.description: Replace the f*rry with a cute Mokou. Voice not included

updates.title: Touhou Unreal Mahjong 4N character tier list
updates.description: Extensive list of all characters, their powers and how well they perform on each stage (in anon's opinion).

updates.title: Touhou Unreal Mahjong 4N Cracked
updates.description: Cracked client for the touhou mahjong game with superpowers and all of that. Supports multiplayer and already contains the English patch.

updates.title: Riichi city emotes (Update 2023-10-11)
updates.description: Animated Riichi City emotes are now back on the repo. Frank grinched updating them on his site.

updates.title: Kaavi's 8ball fortune tourney!
updates.description: Congratulations to Bodoque for winning the Kaavi 8ball tourney! Luckshitter!

updates.title: M-League fantasy league 2023
updates.description: Jinx your favourite M-league players for the upcoming 2023 season. Signup link in the spreadsheet.

updates.title: Ultrasoul
updates.description: Some anon shared this, it's a cute and fun manga from flet(?) about your favorite maajansoul characters.

updates.title: /mjg/ Regular Tourney
updates.description: Congratulations to BURAKINAITO for winning the first and only /mjg/ Regular Tourney!

updates.title: /mjg/ Character Survey Results 2023
updates.description: Anon finally delivered the results of the character survey. Go check it out.

updates.title: Majsoul character faces (Update 2023-08-19)
updates.description: Collection of character faces in various expressions.

updates.title: No Reddit Fetish (Update 2023-08-16)
updates.description: Removes every trace of the reddit fetish from the game.

updates.title: Riichi Cooking in Another World 0.2
updates.description: More ranks, more wwyds: Novice, Adept and Expert rank are implemented. Endgame wwyd modes: Normal, Blitz (10 seconds each) and Rush (60 seconds total). Novice test: only requires 4 correct answers out of 6 now. Cooking game: should calculate mangan value properly now. Also more events and some changes to other stuff like graphic and audio.

updates.title: 3RD >ANNUAL /MJG/ QUESTIONNAIRE
updates.description:
Yet again another autistic aggregation of /mjg/'s opinions and experiences. It's over 3 hours long, holy fucking autism. Also, it's separated in 3 parts.
Part 1: General questions and thread culture
Part 2: /mjg/'s projects, league and tourneys
Part 3: IRL stuff and memes

updates.title: CityLogs
updates.description: Convert your Riichi City logs to tenhou.net/6 JSON format. Analyze converted logs with Mortal or Naga.

updates.title: the /mjg/ WWYD project
updates.description: every rank rates your submitted wwyd. find the form in the thread to submit your wwyd

updates.title: /mjg/ League 4
updates.description: WINNER: DEADÏŸHAND! Congratulations to the boomers, and to everyone who participated and did their best!

updates.title: /mjg/ League 4 Page

updates.title: /mjg/ sings Netsuretsu Kangei Wonderlan
updates.description: Listen to autists sing the ton nan sha pei wai wai ~ song.

updates.title: /mjg/ Majsoul Anniversary Message
updates.description: A heartfelt message from /mjg/, to the Mahjong Soul devs for their 4th anniversary.

updates.title: Hana improvement mod (Updated 2023-05-24)
updates.description:
Upgrade to literally who. Removes Hana's glasses, gives her longer hair and changes her thigh highs from white to black (on default Hana). Now improves her new skin!
Maid Comparison

updates.title: Book dump
updates.description: The 3rd great mahjong dump. Look into this for books not included in the previous one, especially newer stuff. Old man, shibukawa, takizawa, uchikawa, uzaku 4, and so on.

updates.title: Sakurai collection
updates.description: Real flowmaster hours, in 12 simple books. Reading this will take you to celestial in less than 100 hanchans.
